Description: Nylon Filter (to collect nitrate loss during sampling)
Citric Acid-coated Denuder (to collect gaseous NH3)
Na2CO3-coated Denuder (to collect gaseous HNO3, SO2)
Teflon bonded to Glass Fibre Filter
2 Polyurethane Foam plugs (to collect semi-volatile organic compounds)
Teflon bonded to Glass Fibre Filter + 2 Polyurethane Foam plugs (to collect semi-volatile organic compounds)
